result.Case Summary: FINANCIAL INDUSTRY REGULATORY AUTHORITY OFFICE OF HEARING OFFICERS DEPARTMENT OF ENFORCEMENT, Complainant, v. DEBRA L. HANES (CRD No. 5272382), Respondent. Disciplinary Proceeding No. 20070110717-01 Hearing Officer-Andrew H. Perkins DEFAULT DECISION July 8, 2009  Respondent is barred from associating with any member firm In any capacity for her failure to respond to requests for information, in violation of Procedural Rule 8210 and Conduct Rule 2110. In light of the bar, no additional sanction in imposed
